p.o: —You hear that, hen! Tha’s a threat, that!
Detective-sergeant Walter ‘Shrapnel’ Watson of this Force, retired

text.p: Yonder come Miss Mavis... na facail a thainig thugam – cha b ’ ann bho Habacuc no Obadiah :

...umber - ella on her shoulder ,
piece of paper in her hand... well ,
botal agus poit - mhùin
...gonna tell the sheriff
“ GIMME BACK MY MAN ! ”

p.o: Drew , Stu , Una , Margo , Dorothy Jane Stark

text.p: — Tha... well , fhad ’ s tha esan ann .

p.o: St Bernard ’ s Waltz , eau de cologne

text.p:
O , gur cràidhteach an othail
bha san àm a ’ tighinn fodham...

p.o: –Well, it was like this, you see ...
